body:
[I found some more guild squatting](https://ruqqus.com/+trannies). I think this guild in particular was owned by klenvastergan, who's getting unbanned soon, so I'm not going to post about it. [Here's an archive](https://web.archive.org/web/20201202042019/https://ruqqus.com/+trannies).

(I've been wanting to post about +satanism and +whitevictimsofblackcrime, which were sieged about 3 months ago... but I still haven't done it yet.)

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
I found some more guild squatting. I think this guild in particular was owned by klenvastergan, who's getting unbanned soon, so I'm not going to post about it. Here's an archive.

(I've been wanting to post about +satanism and +WhiteVictimsofBlackCrime, which were sieged about 3 months ago... but I still haven't done it yet.)

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]

guild.description:
When someone creates a guild just to make sure no one else has it

***

Added on 2020/12/02:

Also see +HijackedGuilds and +SiegedGuilds!

***

Update on 2021-01-29:

If you want to be the GM of this guild, make a post here.
